title: Presence-Based Strategies for Designing Teaching-Learning Interactions in Online Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online communication experience and general understanding of language learning principles
context.additional_context: Discussion activity design for language learning purposes in smartphone-based offline learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interaction principles of teaching presence, social presence, and cognitive presence in online forums
Learners can develop phased instructional strategies considering the three presences when designing discussion topics
Learners can apply feedback techniques to enhance presence in a smartphone-based offline environment through real-world case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
